problem_names:
lemma bound_effect:
  fixes I::"('sf,'sc,'sz) interp"
  assumes good_interp:"is_interp I"
  shows "\<And>\<nu> :: 'sz state. \<And>\<omega> ::'sz state. hpsafe \<alpha> \<Longrightarrow> (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I \<alpha> \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- (BVP \<alpha>))"
translations:
lemma bound_effect:
  fixes I::"('sf,'sc,'sz) interp"
  assumes good_interp:"is_interp I"
  shows "\<And>\<nu> :: 'sz state. \<And>\<omega> ::'sz state. hpsafe \<alpha> \<Longrightarrow> (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I \<alpha> \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- (BVP \<alpha>))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>hpsafe \<alpha>;
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I \<alpha>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP \<alpha>)
proof (induct rule: hp_induct)
case Var

proof (state)
this:
  hpsafe ($\<alpha> x_)

goal (8 subgoals):
 1. \<And>x \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>hpsafe ($\<alpha> x);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I ($\<alpha> x)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP ($\<alpha> x))
 2. \<And>x1 x2 \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>hpsafe (x1 := x2);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (x1 := x2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP (x1 := x2))
 3. \<And>x1 x2 \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>hpsafe (DiffAssign x1 x2);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (DiffAssign x1 x2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP (DiffAssign x1 x2))
 4. \<And>x \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>hpsafe (? x);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (? x)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP (? x))
 5. \<And>x1 x2 \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>hpsafe (EvolveODE x1 x2);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (EvolveODE x1 x2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP (EvolveODE x1 x2))
 6. \<And>x1 x2 \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>\<nu> \<omega>.
                   \<lbrakk>hpsafe x1;
                    (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I x1\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP x1);
        \<And>\<nu> \<omega>.
           \<lbrakk>hpsafe x2;
            (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I x2\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP x2);
        hpsafe (x1 \<union>\<union> x2);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (x1 \<union>\<union> x2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega>
                          (- BVP (x1 \<union>\<union> x2))
 7. \<And>x1 x2 \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>\<nu> \<omega>.
                   \<lbrakk>hpsafe x1;
                    (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I x1\<rbrakk>
                   \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP x1);
        \<And>\<nu> \<omega>.
           \<lbrakk>hpsafe x2;
            (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I x2\<rbrakk>
           \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP x2);
        hpsafe (x1 ;; x2);
        (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (x1 ;; x2)\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP (x1 ;; x2))
 8. \<And>x \<nu> \<omega>.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>\<nu> \<omega>.
                   \<lbrakk>hpsafe x;

                   \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP x);
        hpsafe x**; (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I x**\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP x**)

assume sem:"(\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I (a \<union>\<union> b)"

proof (prove)

proof (prove)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>hpsafe a; (?\<nu>'5, ?\<omega>'5) \<in> prog_sem I a\<rbrakk>

  \<lbrakk>hpsafe b; (?\<nu>'5, ?\<omega>'5) \<in> prog_sem I b\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Vagree ?\<nu>'5 ?\<omega>'5 (- BVP b)
  (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I a \<or>
  (\<nu>, \<omega>) \<in> prog_sem I b
  hpsafe a
  hpsafe b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP a) \<or> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP b)
by blast
have sub1:"-(BVP a) \<supseteq> (- BVP a \<inter> - BVP b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. - BVP a \<inter> - BVP b \<subseteq> - BVP a
by auto
have sub2:"-(BVP a) \<supseteq> (- BVP a \<inter> - BVP b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. - BVP a \<inter> - BVP b \<subseteq> - BVP a
by auto

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP a \<inter> - BVP b)
using agrees sub1 sub2 agree_supset

proof (prove)
using this:
  Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP a) \<or> Vagree \<nu> \<omega> (- BVP b)
  - BVP a \<inter> - BVP b \<subseteq> - BVP a
  - BVP a \<inter> - BVP b \<subseteq> - BVP a
  \<lbrakk>?B \<subseteq> ?A; Vagree ?\<nu> ?\<nu>' ?A\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Vagree ?\<nu> ?\<nu>' ?B

goal (1 subgoal):
